title: International
content:
Amazon will pay $2.5 billion to settle FTC claims of deceptive Prime enrollment practices. The settlement includes $1.5 billion in refunds for customers allegedly tricked into subscriptions and those who faced difficulty canceling. Eligible subscribers could receive up to $51, with automatic payouts for some and claim forms for others, alongside improved cancellation processes.

Iran and Russia have signed a significant agreement. The deal involves Rosatom building four nuclear power plants in Iran. The project is valued at $25 billion. These Generation III plants will be located in the Sirik region. They are expected to generate 5,000 megawatts of electricity. This move strengthens the relationship between Iran and Russia in the energy sector.
